53.title: Episode #1.53
53.plot: Veronica wins the games by playing dirty. Jaime accidentally eats peanuts and is taken to the emergency room. The bodyguard was told to prevent Andrea from seeing Jaime. Andrea and her friends try their best to get through the bodyguard and see Jaime.

imdb.plot outline: After Oliver left her at the altar on their wedding day, Andrea's heart got shattered into pieces. In order to move on from such heartache, Andrea decides to distract herself by taking on a new job as an Executive Assistant to a newly-single clothing line magnate, Jaime. Her career move not only benefitted the company, but also her recovering heart as she and find themselves falling in love with each other.Will Andrea be ready to become step-mom to Jamie's four children? What will she do when Oliver comes back into the picture? Will she be able to open up her heart even she risks getting hurt once again?
imdb.title: Because of You
plot: After Oliver left her at the altar on their wedding day, Andrea's heart got shattered into pieces. In order to move on from such heartache, Andrea decides to distract herself by taking on a new job as an Executive Assistant to a newly-single clothing line magnate, Jaime. Her career move not only benefitted the company, but also her recovering heart as she and find themselves falling in love with each other.Will Andrea be ready to become step-mom to Jamie's four children? What will she do when Oliver comes back into the picture? Will she be able to open up her heart even she risks getting hurt once again?
